mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Mead, Edward Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Acute rheumatism. Result: Died of inflammation of trachea, larynx and lungs. Also inflammation of the mucus coat of stomach 1865/05/25.
